doc.field: Series V. Civil War and Post-War Period
Series V. Civil War and Post-War Period
New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons
New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons

[No Title] Drawing shows Lincoln standing on Constitution with an African-American woman, holding latter's infant. Two male abolitionists in background. "Tribune" tax bill and a tombstone "in memory of American liberty" in foreground. [Lincoln's choice of anti-slavery over the Union]

[No Title] Drawing shows Lincoln standing on Constitution with an African-American woman, holding latter's infant. Two male abolitionists in background. "Tribune" tax bill and a tombstone "in memory of American liberty" in foreground. [Lincoln's choice of anti-slavery over the Union]
Oil on canvas: unsigned. Acquisition(?) date on back: Feb. 3, 1904.
